articles.description: India face Sri Lanka in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Dubai International Stadium, Dubai – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: India vs Sri Lanka LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Bayern Munich v Arsenal in the UEFA Women's Champions League alongside Man City v Barcelona.
articles.title: Bayern Munich vs Arsenal LIVE: Women’s Champions League score, commentary, stats & updates

articles.description: Joe Root says there are “many more runs still to get” after he overhauled Sir Alastair Cook to become England’s all-time leading Test runscorer.
articles.title: Joe Root says there are 'many more runs to get' after breaking England record

articles.description: Joe Root overtakes Sir Alastair Cook to become England's highest Test run-scorer of all time.
articles.title: Joe Root overtakes Sir Alastair Cook to become England's all-time leading Test run-scorer

articles.description: In a quiet corner of London a small group of extraordinary runners complete laps of an athletics track for a day and a night. Why do they do it? And how far do they go?
articles.title: Sri Chinmoy 24hr track race: Run around in circles for 24 hours

articles.description: Wimbledon will remove line judges and bring in an electronic line calling system from 2025.
articles.title: Wimbledon: Line judges to be removed and electronic calling brought in from 2025

articles.description: Scotland’s faint hopes of progressing to the semi-finals of the Women’s T20 World Cup are over after a crushing a 80-run defeat to South Africa in Dubai.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: Scotland eliminated after 80-run defeat by South Africa

articles.description: Jessica Campbell says she recognises the "magnitude and importance" of becoming the first female full-time assistant coach in NHL history.
articles.title: Jessica Campbell makes history as first female NHL assistant coach

articles.description: Former Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp appointed global head of soccer at Red Bull.
articles.title: Jurgen Klopp: Former Liverpool boss appointed global head of soccer at Red Bull

articles.description: Uncapped duo Curtis Jones and Tino Livramento are added to the senior England squad for this week's Nations League matches against Greece and Finland.
articles.title: England: Curtis Jones and Tino Livramento added to senior squad for Nations League games
